title: Remove pig plushie decorations from Valentine question card

requirements.summary: Remove the five absolutely-positioned pig plushie elements from the ValentineQuestionCard so no pig imagery appears on the question screen.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Question view, no pig plushie images are rendered (no elements referencing /assets/generated/pig-plushie-*.png).
The rest of the ValentineQuestionCard layout remains functional and visually intact (seal, heart bouquet, message text, and Yes/No buttons still render and work).
No console errors are introduced by the removal of the pig images.

file_operations.description: Delete the five decorative, absolutely-positioned pig plushie elements near the top of the card (all pig-plushie-*.dim_256x256.png references) while keeping the surrounding CardContent structure intact so the seal, bouquet, message, and buttons continue to render and function.

requirements.summary: Remove all remaining frontend code references to pig plushie static image assets so the app no longer attempts to load them.
acceptanceCriteria: A project-wide search shows zero references to the pig plushie filenames in frontend source files after the change.
The app builds and runs without attempting to load any pig plushie images.

file_operations.description: Ensure there are zero remaining references to pig plushie assets in this component (including: /assets/generated/pig-plushie-bunny.dim_256x256.png, /assets/generated/pig-plushie-angel.dim_256x256.png, /assets/generated/pig-plushie-stack.dim_256x256.png, /assets/generated/pig-plushie-blanket.dim_256x256.png, /assets/generated/pig-plushie-external-1.dim_256x256.png).
